name: Sensible Massacre 2
overview: This game is a sequel to Sensible Massacre (England v Holland) also created by James Hall and is another spoof of Sensible Soccer. It was featured on Amiga Action 70, disk 3. You can choose how long the game lasts, how fast the opposition is, and the color of the pitch. After the game, you are told how many players are 'home' (killed by you) and how many are 'away' (reached the goal-line successfully).
